name: Help Me Doctor
description: Become a doctor! Help to diagnose patients. Be careful with the documentation, signatures etc. Decide what your ethics will be. What will you do, when a patient comes and say: Help me, doctor!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP 64bit Processor: AMD A6-4400M Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD7520G DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Purple
recommended_requirements: OS: Skynet 512bit Processor: Liquid nano-cluster. Memory: 69 GB RAM Graphics: Shouldn't matter in games. Gameplay FTW! Sound Card: Green for better performance
